overview.en: PlayGame (PXG) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. PlayGame has a current supply of 1,000,000,000 with 999,875,000 in circulation. The last known price of PlayGame is 0.00039028 USD and is down -13.35 over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 1 active market(s) with $18,429.18 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://its.playgame.com/.
